title: Easy Watch face
summary: Clean and simple watch face for saving battery life.
description: Made for Android Wear smart watch.
descriptionHTML: Made for Android Wear smart watch.
comments: Very beautiful watch face but the card preview kinda ruin it, hope u make an option to disable the card preview in the next update. EDIT: thanks for the quick reply and update, one of my favorite watchface
Clean and simple A very nice face that isn't complicated.  Unfortunately, card previews cover up the face.
recentChanges: *Fix card previews cover up the watch face
